Text: FWJeff I wonder if you received my earlier email The company I mentioned now has a million project with a US top three LTL client based on its somewhat innovative approach to supply chain management Is there an exec in Enron who might be interested in talking to the CEO Regards Graham Sharman Original Message From Sharman GJ Sent Wednesday April AM To Jeff nroncom Subject Dear Jeff Greetings from Santa Fe where Gay and I are spending an increasing part of our postMcKinsey days I seem to remember seeing an article several months ago in which you said that Enron would be getting involved in the physical aspects of several of the industries where you operate your successful market places I wonder if you have a supply chain strategist or is that you who might be interested to chat with the CEO of a small supply chain strategy and execution consultancy Ive known this individual professionally for several years as weve been on speaking platforms and forums together He asked me to be on his advisory board when he started Symbius about months ago Your supply chainlogistics manager could also visit them at wwwsymbiuscom
